name: Just Another Pong Game
description:
INSTRUCTIONS:
Player1: W & S
Player2: UP & Down arrows

What this is: 
I have made a few games now where I was trying out different concepts and genres. For this game, however, I decided to make the most simple game I could think of and polish it as much as I can.

I hope you enjoy my game and any feedback on features to further polish it would be appreciated.
